Indra Sjafri dan Fakhri Husaini Sampaikan Duka Atas Meninggalnya Alfin Lestaluhu
01 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kabar meninggalnya Alfin Lestaluhu membuat dua pelatih kelompok umur timnas Indonesia, Fakhri Husaini dan Indra Sjafri berduka. Keduanya mengaku merasa sangat kehilangan pemain yang memperkuat timnas Indonesia U-16 itu.
Dunia sepak bola Indonesia dikejutkan dengan meninggalnya Alfin Lestaluhu. Penggawa Timnas Indonesia U-16 itu mengembuskan napas terakhir setelah menjalani perawatan selama sebulan terakhir.
Alfin merupakan satu di antara korban gempa Ambon yang terjadi pada akhir September lalu. Ia diboyong ke Jakarta untuk mendapatkan perawatan intensif.
Namun, takdir berbicara lain. Alfin meninggal dan membuat sepak bola Indonesia berduka, termasuk Fakhri Husaini.
"Keluarga Besar Timnas U19 mengucapkan turut berduka yang mendalam atas wafatnya adik kita pemain Timnas U15 Alfin Farhan Lestaluhu. Semoga almarhum husnul khotimah dan keluarga yang ditinggalkan diberikanNya kesabaran, ketabahan," tulis Fakhri di akun Instagram pribadinya.
Selama bermain, Alfin Lestaluhu dikenal sebagai bek kanan yang energik. Ia kerap menyumbang gol yang sensasional untuk Timnas Indonesia U-16.

Indra Sjafri and Fakhri Husaini convey their condolences over the death of Alfin Lestaluhu
Nov 01 2019, 09:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The news of the death of Alfin Lestaluhu made two Indonesian national team age group coaches, Fakhri Husaini and Indra Sjafri grieve. Both claimed to feel very lost the player who strengthened the Indonesian U-16 national team.
The world of Indonesian football was shocked by the death of Alfin Lestaluhu. Penggawa Indonesian U-16 national team was exhaled last after undergoing treatment for the past month.
Alfin was one of the victims of the Ambon earthquake that occurred at the end of September. He was brought to Jakarta to get intensive care.
However, fate speaks differently. Alfin died and made Indonesian football grieve, including Fakhri Husaini.
"The U19 National Team big family wishes to express our deepest condolences over the death of our younger brother U15 national team player Alfin Farhan Lestaluhu. Hopefully the late Husnul Khotimah and the family left behind will be given patience, fortitude," wrote Fakhri on his personal Instagram account.
During play, Alfin Lestaluhu is known as an energetic right-back. He often contributed sensational goals for the U-16 Indonesian national team.
